overview: This this is genuine stuff down to the core; what you see being brought in on the stretchers is the real thing, whether or not you wish to believe so: Cadavers are  carried out in their most mutilated forms rape victims with severed heads, murder casualties sliced from head to toe, and corpses from airplane crashes with their skin completely separated from their bodies.
tagline: Some people have to prepare for seeing the remains of a human being in the most dismembered forms
title: PornGore Vol. 2
